title: The ever evolving journey of
text:
Rasmus Bejder, a multimedia design student based in Odense, Denmark.
I’ve walked a diverse path. At 43, my background spans customer service, IT support, case handling, forestry, and wilderness guiding. Each experience has added something valuable to my unique skill set.
When I’m not designing, I’m capturing moments through my camera lens or exploring the outdoors on hikes and camping trips. Music festivals and tech fascinate me, feeding my curiosity about media, web design, and technology.
If you’re looking for someone who can bring a genuine mix of experiences to the table, I’m here. Let’s chat about how my journey can add value to your projects.





A photo of me on a mountain
